Eshanya Maheshwari (born 17 June 1993) is a model and former actress who worked in Tamil, Telugu and Hindi films.
Career
After working in the successful horror film Raju Gari Gadhi (2015), she worked on Tamil films including the horror film Peigal Jaakkirathai and Rocky: The Revenge (2019) and a Hindi film before retiring from the industry.
